text: Yashpal Sharma (; 11 August 1954 â€“ 13 July 2021) was an Indian international cricketer. He played during the 1970s and 80s. He was a member of the India team that won the 1983 Cricket World Cup. He represented India in 37 tests. He was born in Ludhiana, India. Sharma died of cardiac arrest on 13 July 2021 in New Delhi at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian cricketers Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Yashpal Sharma (cricketer)
